name: HyperReach
0:
”Alexa, open Hyper Reach.”
”Alexa, ask Hyper Reach to read notifications.”
”Alexa, tell Hyper Reach to check alerts.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hyper reach
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Stay informed with Hyper Reach, a skill that delivers emergency notifications from your local public service officials directly to your Alexa device. The skill is available to people who live in cities or counties that currently offer Hyper Reach notification services. 

To sign up, say "enable Hyper Reach" and accept the Alexa Notifications and Device Address permissions on your Alexa app.

When your public safety officials send a Hyper Reach notification, the notification will be sent directly to your device. You can access the message on your Alexa device by saying "Alexa, open Hyper Reach." Alexa will read back any current Hyper Reach messages that affect your area. If the message contains an attachment, we will send a Card to your Alexa app. View the image in the Activity Feed on your app.

If you don't live in an area that supports Hyper Reach you can still sign up. We will save your information to send alerts to you if or when your area is supported.
